page.description: Returns a CRLF delimited list of all physical files in a set.

argument.name: setname
argument.description: The name of a set. The extension ".set" is assumed.

page.discussion: LIST_FILES_IN_SET() returns a CR-LF delimited character string list containing the fully qualified names of the components of the set.
page.example: dim cs as C cs = list_files_in_set("invoice") cs -> c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice.set c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice.sem c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice.sex c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice_header.dbf c:\databases\alphasports official\customer.dbf c:\databases\alphasports official\customer.fpt c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice_items.dbf c:\databases\alphasports official\product.dbf c:\databases\alphasports official\vendor.dbf
